name: kan
description: kan is a minimalist self hosted kanban board for personal or team task management. It provides columns, cards, drag and drop reordering and simple metadata, focusing on speed and a distraction free workflow.

features.title: Kanban Workflow
features.description: Columns and cards with drag-and-drop reordering. Visualize work progress intuitively

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Lightweight codebase with instant load times and responsive interactions. Work without delays

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write task descriptions and notes in markdown format. Rich text without heavy editors

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Tasks stored locally with optional sync capabilities. Own your data completely

features.title: Media Library
features.description: No complex configuration required, start using immediately. Perfect for personal projects

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Add due dates, priorities, and tags to organize tasks. Track important details simply
